title: Can't access Game Download or Support.
body:
I got the RADS error, so after trying numerous methods in attempt to solve it, I decided to reinstall the game.

However, when I wanted to redownload League, Pressing download shows me this screen : http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/ShellInstaller/OC1/LeagueofLegends_OC1_Installer_9_15_2014.exe
http://gyazo.com/fd0eaed91db6ebeda4c95667c10e8b92

I'm kinda at a lost as to what to do.

Also, I can't access support @ Support.riotgames.com

It tells me "this page is not availiable.

replies.body:
Hi,

There is a [sticky thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/I8XUgB8w-rads-error-or-unable-to-connect-to-supportriotgamescom) at the top of this board about this.

In the first comment (by Riot Zaps), there are instructions to fix your DNS.

Let me know if that helps!

Cheers
-Mindstar
